BLINDDEATHSAVES.blindDeathSaves.name: Blind Death Saves
BLINDDEATHSAVES.blindDeathSaves.hint: Disabling this will allow the Players to see the status of their Death Saves in the character sheet and roll as private GM roll instead of blind.
BLINDDEATHSAVES.notificationText: Your roll is hidden from you, because your Gamemaster has set it to be rolled in secret.
